text: "We may be tired, bloodied, and yes fearful, but we are not done. It is not yet enough. Especially now and today, It is not yet enough. When I spoke last year, I promised to never stop fighting for All Of Us, to never stop leaning in."
clean_text: may tired bloodied yes fearful done yet enough especially today yet enough spoke last year promised never stop fighting never stop leaning

text: "The last 4 years, we have tried to come together, repeatedly, to make things better. To enact change. To build transparency and trust. To build unity. WE are not done. "
clean_text: last year tried come together repeatedly make thing better enact change build transparency trust build unity done
nouns: year thing change build transparency trust build unity

text: "I see all of you, all of us. Your concerns are valid. Your emotions are valid. Your fear and angst and anger are valid. As your spokesperson and President ‚Äî I see you all."
clean_text: see concern valid emotion valid fear angst anger valid spokesperson president see
nouns: see concern emotion fear angst anger spokesperson president

text: "To our senior physicians who ‚Äì after dedicating a lifetime to the service of the people and communities of Ontario ‚Äî are now struggling with the Sophie‚Äôs choice of caring for others vs caring for yourselves, I see you."
clean_text: senior physician dedicating lifetime service people community ontario struggling sophies choice caring others caring see

text: "To the single parents juggling your children patient duties, with the new challenge of social isolation ‚Äî I see you, you are not alone. To the sandwich generation, desperately trying to keep parents children safe and connected, while safely separated ‚Äî I see you, too."
clean_text: single parent juggling child patient duty new challenge social isolation see alone sandwich generation desperately trying keep parent child safe connected safely separated see
nouns: parent patient duty challenge isolation generation parent child see

text: "To our junior colleagues ‚Äî still trying to find their way in this system ‚Äî now struggling with a plethora of additional challenges, and less mentorship and guidance than you may have foreseen ‚Äî I see you rise to this challenge. "
clean_text: junior colleague still trying find way system struggling plethora additional challenge mentorship guidance may foreseen see rise challenge
nouns: colleague way system challenge mentorship guidance rise challenge

text: "It has threatened our mental health. At a time when member burnout is already at an all-time high, for many of us, the challenges brought by COVID-19 threaten to overwhelm. "
clean_text: threatened mental health time member burnout already alltime high many challenge brought covid threaten overwhelm

text: "Our society is seized by a medical and public health crisis I never foresaw. Most of us never did. It has threatened our lives and personal safety. Worse, it has threatened our families and loved ones. And these are only the most obvious of threats."
clean_text: society seized medical public health crisis never foresaw never threatened life personal safety worse threatened family loved one obvious threat
nouns: society health crisis life safety worse family threat

text: "It was Charles Dickens who said: ‚ÄúIt was the best of times, it was the worst of times.‚Äù Of another time, place, and crisis of course, but still. "
clean_text: charles dickens said best time worst time another time place crisis course still
nouns: time time time place crisis course

text: Council - I miss you all, much like I miss my friends and extended family. I miss being able to shake your hand, to look you in the eye, to sit with you and listen to your concerns.
clean_text: council miss much like miss friend extended family miss able shake hand look eye sit listen concern
nouns: council friend family miss shake hand eye sit concern

text: "To @drmsgandhi, in particular, I say, thank you for steering us calmly through so many crises in a single year, and leaving such a giant void to fill."
clean_text: particular say thank steering calmly many crisis single year leaving giant void fill

text: It‚Äôs an honor to be here today, to be following in the footsteps of truly impressive physician leaders like @drmsgandhi, @DocSchmadia, and others. I would not be here today without their support, mentorship and tutelage.
clean_text: honor today following footstep truly impressive physician leader like others would today without support mentorship tutelage
nouns: honor today footstep leader today support mentorship tutelage
